feed.title: New serialization/encoding format for key material

entry.title: New serialization/encoding format for key material
entry.summary: A proposal for BIP has been made available by Jonas Schnelli, which can be accessed through the link provided in the message. The reference C code is also available on GitHub. Feedback and criticism are welcome regarding the proposal. The message ends with a signature.asc attachment, which is a digitally signed message using OpenPGP.
